content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --LOC
      operator: not_exists
    - name: --LAT
      operator: exists
Core:
  Id: CORE-000079
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --LOC is not present and --LAT is present.
Outcome:
  Message: --LAT is present when --LOC is not present.
  Output Variables:
    - --LOC
    - --LAT
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0095
              Version: '2'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Events[Variable Qualifier of --LOC]|Interventions[Variable
                  Qualifier of --LOC]|Findings[Variable Qualifier of --LOC]
                Document: Model v2.0
                Section: Events|Interventions|Findings
                Item: --LAT
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --LOC is not present and --LAT is present.

Outcome.Message: --LAT is present when --LOC is not present.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Events[Variable Qualifier of --LOC]|Interventions[Variable Qualifier of --LOC]|Findings[Variable Qualifier of --LOC]
